search_query: New World (Overture) Björk Dancer in the Dark

match_score.reasoning: Candidate 2 is the best match because it is an official upload from the 'Björk - Topic' channel, which is auto-generated by YouTube from the rights holders. The video title 'New World' directly matches the primary part of the soundtrack title 'New World (Overture)' and the official album tracklist. The description explicitly states 'New World · Björk' and confirms it's from the 'Selma Songs' album (the soundtrack for 'Dancer in the Dark'). Furthermore, it lists Björk Guðmundsdóttir and Lars Von Trier as composers/lyricists, which aligns perfectly with the provided soundtrack metadata. While the video title omits '(Overture)', this is a common occurrence where the full descriptive title from a movie soundtrack might be shortened to the core track title on an album or official release. The authenticity and detailed metadata in the description make this the most reliable and accurate match.
key_factors: Official 'Björk - Topic' channel, indicating an authentic and high-quality upload from rights holders.
Video title 'New World' matches the core part of the soundtrack title and the official album track name.
Artist 'Björk' is correctly identified in the title and description.
Description explicitly mentions 'Selma Songs', the album associated with the 'Dancer in the Dark' movie.
Composer and lyricist information (Björk Guðmundsdóttir, Lars Von Trier) in the description aligns with the soundtrack metadata.
